title: (BONUS EP) Unsuspecting Suspects
description: The gals practice their detective skills on some not-so-obvious criminal profiles. Topics include highly questionable police stops, a jolly old grandma with a very dark habit, and an entrepreneurial (and exploitative) suburban pig mom. Treat yo'self to a bottle of Bogle Vineyards Phantom Red Blend, rewatch Homeward Bound, and tune in for Unsuspecting Suspects. For a full list of show sponsors, visit www.wineandcrimepodcast.com/support
